hero.headline: The AI phone assistant that never ghosts your clients — and never wakes up grumpy.
hero.subline: No hold music. No phone menus. Just smooth, human-like conversations that book clients for you.
hero.cta: I want Kleedo on my phone

features.title: When someone calls, someone always answers.
features.subtitle: Meet Kleedo — your always-on phone assistant that handles calls, books clients, and keeps your calendar full.

phone.title: Every call picked up — instantly.
phone.description: Even when you’re busy, Kleedo picks up right away so you never lose a client.

scheduling.title: Smooth day, no gaps
scheduling.description: Keeps your schedule tight and efficient — no awkward gaps, no overbooking.

communication.title: Smart confirmations via WhatsApp & SMS
communication.description: Sends automatic confirmations and reminders, so clients always know their spot is booked.

features.headline: When someone calls, someone always answers.

cards.description: AI receptionist picks up the phone instantly, even when you're in a meeting or with a client.

cards.title: Smooth day, no gaps
cards.description: Intelligently schedules appointments so there are no gaps between meetings. Maximum time utilization and more business.

cards.title: Appointment rescue
cards.description: When someone cancels, Kleedo automatically offers the free time to the next person on your waiting list.

cards.title: WhatsApp communication & automatic confirmation
cards.description: All bookings, confirmations and reminders work automatically via WhatsApp and SMS. Clients get confirmation immediately.

problem.title: When you don't answer, your competitor does.
problem.subtitle: Missed calls are the #1 reason clients choose your competitors.

missed.description: Every missed call is a lost opportunity. When you can’t pick up, your competitor does — and that’s revenue gone.

lost.description: While you lose money, they make it. Every missed call is a potential customer for the competition.

time.title: Too much time on the phone
time.description: Manual callbacks, scheduling, and reminders — all the admin that keeps you from doing what you love.

cards.title: More clients, more revenue
cards.description: A missed call no longer means a missed deal. Even one or two extra bookings per week can add thousands in revenue — Kleedo fills your calendar while you focus on your craft.

cards.title: Fewer calls, more time for work
cards.description: Routine calls eat up to 5 hours of your week. Kleedo handles them all — so you can finally do the work that matters.

cards.title: You set the rules
cards.description: You’re the boss. Decide when Kleedo answers, what it offers, and in what language. Total control, zero chaos.

finalCta.headline: No more missed clients.
finalCta.description: AI receptionist with human voice picks up the phone and takes care of clients according to your rules. No unnecessary waiting, no voicemails.

creed.text: Trial access during pilot — no commitments

items.question: Can AI make mistakes in booking?
items.answer: Kleedo behaves like a professional receptionist. It checks your calendar before confirming any booking, and you can set clear rules for tricky situations.

items.question: Will AI recognize different client requests?
items.answer: Yes, AI can recognize different types of services and requests. You can set rules for how AI should react to different situations and client types.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Pricing starts from 990 CZK/month. During the pilot, all plans are discounted and flexible — no long-term contracts.

items.question: What about data protection?
items.answer: Data protection is our priority. All data is encrypted, stored in the EU, and fully compliant with GDPR. You have full data subject rights according to our Privacy Policy.

items.question: Can I set how AI talks to my clients?
items.answer: Yes, you have full control over how AI communicates. You can set the tone of communication, phrases it should use, and even what services it should offer.

items.question: What if I don't have Google Calendar?
items.answer: Kleedo will connect to more calendar systems in the future - Google, Outlook, Apple iCal or others. We're continuously adding more calendar and booking systems. You can also use our own calendar solution.

items.question: How many calls can it handle simultaneously?
items.answer: AI receptionist can handle multiple calls simultaneously. You can set rules for transferring calls to you according to your needs.

items.question: Can Kleedo work 24/7?
items.answer: Kleedo is available according to your settings. You can set business hours when AI should take calls, and when it should redirect to you.

items.question: What if AI doesn't understand the client?
items.answer: AI is designed to understand natural speech. If it's not sure, it will ask for clarification or transfer the call to you according to your settings.

items.question: Do I need to install anything?
items.answer: No, Kleedo works over internet connection. You don't need any installation or special equipment. Just register and start using.

hero.headline: Peace of mind costs less than a {highlight} lost deal
hero.subline: Pick a plan that fits. Join our pilot — no commitments.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. All plans include our core AI receptionist features.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: For small businesses and solo entrepreneurs.

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: For growing teams and busier schedules.

plans.name: Business
plans.description: For bigger companies that need full customization and support.

pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

faq.question: Can I change plans anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the beginning of your next billing cycle.

faq.question: Is there a setup fee?
faq.answer: No setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription. We handle all the technical setup for you.

faq.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
faq.answer: We'll notify you if you're approaching your limits. You can upgrade your plan or we can discuss custom solutions for high-volume usage.

footer.description: AI phone assistant that picks up, books, and never gets tired.
